events.message: We have received Jane Doe's application for the software engineer position, and her resume showcases strong experience in backend development.
Jane's application has been categorized under Engineering based on her skills in software development and prior experience as a developer.
Recruiter Alex Smith has been assigned to Jane's case to manage further communication and scheduling of interviews.
Initial phone screening with Jane was successful. She demonstrated a solid understanding of software engineering principles and relevant technologies.
Jane responded promptly confirming her availability for the next step, expressing enthusiasm about the opportunity to join our engineering team.
The first technical interview has been scheduled with the lead developer for May 6th, 10:00 AM UTC. Candidate was notified accordingly.
